resources.string: By using NetGuard, you agree to the GNU General Public License version 3

Great care has been taken to develop and test NetGuard, however it is impossible to guarantee it will work correctly on each and every device. NetGuard is known to crash when activated or known to block all traffic on some devices. This is caused by bugs in Android, or in the software provided by the manufacturer, so please don\'t blame NetGuard for this. \n\nBy using NetGuard, you agree to the GNU General Public License version 3

NetGuard uses the VpnService API to route selected traffic either onward to the internet if allowed or into a sinkhole if blocked, hence Android will ask your permission to allow the creation of a local only VPN connection. Please grant that permission to allow NetGuard to run.
NetGuard is disabled, use the switch above to enable NetGuard
